short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Invert webpage colors for a comfortable viewing experience in low light, keeping images and videos intact for best experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform the look of any webpage by inverting its colors for a more comfortable viewing experience, especially in low-light environments. 

This feature intelligently reverses the colors of text, backgrounds, and other UI elements without affecting the integrity of images or videos. Graphics and multimedia content remain in their original, vibrant colors, ensuring clarity and visual appeal. It's perfect for reducing eye strain, enhancing readability, or simply personalizing your browsing experience without compromising essential visual details.  

You can also make it remember the domain name so that next time when you visit the website it automatically inverts the colors for you.
